content:
I wrote a book / booklet titled "What you need to know about owning a website" to put on our web hosting website and thought I'd put it on Amazon Kindle just so I can legitimately say I'm an author... sad I know... anyway, It's free on our website.

I was looking at the business bank statement and Â£0.19 had been deposited by Amazon;.I thought someone had started a scam with Amazon... and wasting 30 minutes looking into it...

It transpires I sold two books on Kindle lol :smile:

I didn't expect to sell any, but hey, I'm now an Author lol :smile: Who'd have thought?
